name: dramaturgically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the art or the theory of writing and putting on plays, especially for the theatre: The opera included a number of dramaturgically complex scenes. The character's death is unnecessary dramaturgically. Related words
dramaturgical
dramaturgy
More examplesFewer examplesMy main aim is to create a dramaturgically coherent and exciting play.This was the most dramaturgically effective scene in the production.The length of the play is dramaturgically problematic.My job is to put the scenes together in a pattern that is dramaturgically effective.
